subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The most expensive of the 12 stadiums built or revamped for next year’s World Cup in Brazil has a leaking roof less than eight months after it was finished, the stadium’s operators said.
snippet: The most expensive of the 12 stadiums built or revamped for next year’s World Cup in Brazil has a leaking roof less than eight months after it was finished, the stadium’s operators said.
